Package au.edu.anu.twapps.mm.undo

Class Caretaker

java.lang.Object
au.edu.anu.twapps.mm.undo.Caretaker
public class Caretaker extends Object
Author:
Ian Davies - 1 Jun 2020

A static class to manage the list of IMemento and the index of the current state.

  • Method Details

    • initialise

      public static void initialise()
      Called when a project opens to clear any remaining IMementos. Only required is project has terminated unexpectedly.

    • finalise

      public static void finalise()
      Called when a project closes to clear any remaining IMementos.

    • addState

      public static void addState​(IMemento m)
      Add an IMemento state to the list and increment the index.
      Parameters:
      m - The new state.

    • prev

      public static IMemento prev()
      Step back to the previous state in an undo operation.
      Returns:
      The previous state.

    • succ

      public static IMemento succ()
      Step forward to the next state in a redo operation.
      Returns:
      The next state.

    • hasPrev

      public static boolean hasPrev()
      Does a previous state exist? Used to update a control with 'undo' option.
      Returns:
      true if a previous state exists, false otherwise.

    • hasSucc

      public static boolean hasSucc()
      Does a successor state exist? Used to update a control with 'redo' option.
      Returns:
      true if a successor state exists, false otherwise.

    • getPrevDescription

      public static String getPrevDescription()
      Getter for the Description of the previous state.
      Returns:
      The description.

    • getSuccDescription

      public static String getSuccDescription()
      Getter for the Description of the successor state.
      Returns:
      The description.
